Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Lactococcus lactis (MIC=12 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=100 µM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=100 µM), Streptococcus uberis (MIC=50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Fallaxidin-4.1 shows antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria. Inhibits the formation of NO by neuronal nitric oxide synthase (IC50=13.3 µM).
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed by the skin dorsal glands.

Literature.Title: The fallaxidin peptides from the skin secretion of the Eastern Dwarf Tree Frog Litoria fallax. Sequence determination by positive and negative ion electrospray mass spectrometry antimicrobial activity and cDNA cloning of the fallaxidins.
Literature.Author: Jackway RJ, Bowie JH, Bilusich D, Musgrave IF, Surinya-Johnson KH, Tyler MJ, Eichinger PC.

Literature.Title: The fallaxidin peptides from the skin secretion of the eastern dwarf tree frog Litoria fallax. Sequence determination by positive and negative ion electrospray mass spectrometry: antimicrobial activity and cDNA cloning of the fallaxidins.
Literature.Author: Surinya-Johnson K.H.,Musgrave I.F.,Bilusich D.,Bowie J.H.,Jackway R.J.
